lyric:
[00:13.230]When tomorrow comes
[00:14.600]I'll be on my own
[00:16.100]Feeling frightened up
[00:17.650]The things that I don't know
[00:19.410]When tomorrow comes
[00:21.280]Tomorrow comes
[00:22.890]Tomorrow comes
[00:25.920]And though the road is long
[00:27.510]I look up to the sky
[00:29.080]In the dark I found, I stop and I won’t fly
[00:32.300]And I sing along, I sing along, then I sing along
[00:39.060]I got all I need when I got you and I
[00:42.290]I look around me, and see sweet life
[00:45.490]I'm stuck in the dark but you're my flashlight
[00:48.750]You're gettin’ me, gettin’ me through the night
[00:52.230]Can’t stop my heart when you shinin’ in my eyes
[00:55.490]Can’t lie, it’s a sweet life
[00:58.720]I'm stuck in the dark but you're my flashlight

[01:06.650]Cause you're my flash light
[01:09.680]You're my flash light, you're my flash light

[01:21.130]I'm not the afraid when the rain won't stop

[01:26.370]You light the way, you light the way

[02:16.480]I look around me, and see sweet life
[02:18.760]I'm stuck in the dark but you're my flashlight
[02:19.750]You're gettin’ me, gettin’ me through the night
[02:23.100]Can’t stop my heart when you shinin’ in my eyes
[02:26.280]Can’t lie, it’s a sweet life

[02:32.670]You're gettin’ me, gettin’ me through the night
[02:36.050]Cause you're my flash light
[02:40.380]You're my flash light, you're my flash light
[03:01.060]you're my flash light
tlyric:
[by:大评论家]
[00:13.230]当明天来临
[00:14.600]我将只身一人
[00:16.100]恐惧油然而生
[00:17.650]这未知的恐惧
[00:19.410]当明天来临
[00:21.280]明天来临
[00:22.890]明天来临
[00:25.920]尽管长路漫漫
[00:27.510]我也要仰望苍穹
[00:29.080]在那黑暗之下  我停下步伐  无力飞翔
[00:32.300]我独自歌唱  我独自歌唱  我一路歌唱
[00:39.060]当你我为伴 我便得到全世界
[00:42.290]我四处寻找  追寻快乐
[00:45.490]我深陷黑暗  但你向我投来一束光芒
[00:48.750]你一步步  靠近我  彻夜相伴
[00:52.230]当你映入我眼帘  心跳便无法自己
[00:55.490]无法否认  这便是快乐
[00:58.720]我深陷黑暗  但你为我亮起一束光芒
[01:01.530]你一步步  靠近我  彻夜相伴
[01:06.650]因为你是那一束光
[01:09.680]你是那一束光  你将我的生命点亮
[01:18.170]我看见暗影  藏于峰峦下
[01:21.130]我不曾畏惧  任大雨倾盆
[01:24.260]只因你照亮前路
[01:26.370]照亮前路  为我领航
